channel.title: Need more help pls
channel.description:
how do i make it so no1 can ban me???
i have server and i keep gettin ban and i want it to say "you stupid ***** (playername) you cant ban the owner!!" and make it so itll send to whole server so ino who trys ban me?
and same for my co owner?

item.title: Need more help pls
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

Ok…So he wrote he always got banned by someone else. This && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here"))) will only let the guy called “name here” to use this command;so no one else can bann him.
And as he wanted to know who banned him thisSystem.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned")will tell.
~veki~

Read full topic

item.title: Need more help pls
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

[code] if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("banlogs.txt place here", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
This will only allow that guy to use banuser command.And it should send a massage too.
This doesn’t send a massage as you wanted but you can add it easly.
~veki~

Read full topic
